title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
There is a difference of 393.8 between the maximum Games League of Legends and minimum Games World of Warcraft.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
Games Fortnite has the second highest value for Number of hours watched.
There is a difference of 393.8 between the maximum Games League of Legends and minimum Games World of Warcraft.
Games League of Legends is higher than any other Gamess with value 512.3, followed by Fortnite, and Just Chatting. Down to Games World of Warcraft with the lowest value 118.5.
The average Number of hours watched in all 10 Gamess is 258.19.
